title: Amethyst - Princess of Gemworld # 1-12 (DC)
description:
A very trippy series that probably was targeted at young girls, but i'm really not too sure when i look at the artwork and character design that might benefit from the influence of a bongpipe

12 issues published by DC 1983-1984

For twenty years the evil Dark Opal has reigned  and ruled Gemworld. However unbeknownst to him  a sorceress for the Amethyst monarchy hid away the young princess.Now on earth she has turned 13 years old. When she is called forth she is a twenty year old woman. Can she bring forth a new age to Gemworld. Can she figure out her powers in the course of this twelve issue maxi-series ? Can she defeat Dark Opal.     
 
The first Amethyst 12-issue maxi series from writers Gary Cohn and Dan Mishkin with art from Ernie Colon.
